H0.text: Of all the rugby teams to have participated in the 2008- 2009 Guinness Premiership, which team is furthest west. Bath

H1.text: Of all the rugby teams to have participated in the 2008- 2009 Guinness Premiership, which team is furthest west. Gloucester

H2.text: Of all the rugby teams to have participated in the 2008- 2009 Guinness Premiership, which team is furthest west. Exeter

H3.text: Of all the rugby teams to have participated in the 2008- 2009 Guinness Premiership, which team is furthest west. Bristol

A4.text: Bath Rugby is a professional rugby union club in Bath, Somerset, England.

A5.text: Matches with local rivals Bristol Bears and Gloucester are referred to as West Country derbies.
